message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my [product name] for $2000000.  It's a unique opportunity to own a piece of [mention any unique features or value proposition].  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the unique features of the [product name]. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $2000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product and your counteroffer. However, $1500000 is below my minimum price point. I'm willing to come down to $1750000 to demonstrate my commitment to this deal. Let's find a middle ground.

Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1650000. I believe this brings us closer to finding a mutually agreeable price.
